title: Hired Hands: Wanderlust
description: When Alan hires a drifter, John, to be his farm hand, he finds himself dealing with desires he’d put away long before. Worse, these forbidden feelings are aimed straight at the handsome young man now in his employ. An overnight camping trip puts Alan and John in close quarters …for the first time, Alan wonders if John isn’t the only one with wanderlust.
author: Jake Donovan
